README.TITLE: Planimeter Models
README.AUTHOR: Charles Care
README.SHORTDESCRIPTION: Models of Oppikofer and Wetli Planimeters
README.LONGDESCRIPTION:
Model of an Oppikofer planimeter in tkeden. This was constructed to illustrate a talk given to the British Society of the History of Mathematics (BSHM). Tracing a figure on the 2D input table causes the 3D model to calculate the area of the that figure.
Also, a model of a Wetli planimeter (see sub directory 'wetli'). This model is an adapted version of the cone one presented in the root directory that was made for Steve Russ's visit to Germany.
See the file HOWTORUN.txt
The model requires the EDEN software available on this site. For users without this software, a video screen shot is provided as a 'tour'.
